LinkedList Index¶

class LinkedList(traceHeapForStep)¶

Class that creates a linked list for a single visualization step

Class constructor

Arguments:
  • traceHeapForStep (Object) – The trace heap for a single step
LinkedList.checkIfCircularList()¶

Check if the linked list is circular or not

LinkedList.difference(OtherLinkedList, diff)¶

Calculats the difference between this linked list and the other linkedlist

Arguments:
  • OtherLinkedList (LinkedList) – The other linked list that will be compared with this linked list
  • diff (Hash) – Hash table
LinkedList.equals(OtherLinkedList)¶

checks if the current linked list is equal to the other linked list

Arguments:
  • OtherLinkedList (LinkedList) – the other linked list that will be compared to the current linked list
LinkedList.getNode(index)¶

returns the node at the given index

LinkedList.getNodeByReference(reference)¶

returns the reference of the node that has the given reference

LinkedList.getNodeLocation(reference)¶

return the location of the node with the specified reference

Arguments:
  • reference (String) – the node reference
LinkedList.isCircular()¶

returns the true if the list is circular, false otherwise

LinkedList.removeAt(index)¶

Removes a node at the specified index

Arguments:
  • index (Integer) – The index of the node that will be removed
LinkedList.size()¶

returns the number of nodes inside the linked list
